*/import{useEffect,useState}from"react";// react-router-dom components
import{useLocation}from"react-router-dom";// prop-types is a library for typechecking of props
// Argon Dashboard 2 MUI components
import ArgonBox from"components/ArgonBox";// Argon Dashboard 2 MUI example components
import DashboardLayout from"examples/LayoutContainers/DashboardLayout";import DashboardNavbar from"examples/Navbars/DashboardNavbar";import Footer from"examples/Footer";import Sidenav from"examples/Sidenav";// Argon Dashboard 2 MUI context
import{useArgonController,setMiniSidenav,setLayout,setDarkSidenav}from"context";// Argon Dashboard 2 MUI routes
import routes from"routes";// Custom styles for the BaseLayout
import{baseLayout,baseLayoutBackground,baseLayoutContent}from"layouts/virtual-reality/components/BaseLayout/styles";// Images
import brand from"assets/images/logo-ct.png";import brandDark from"assets/images/logo-ct-dark.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BaseLayout(_ref){let{children}=_ref;const[controller,dispatch]=useArgonController();const{miniSidenav,sidenavColor,darkSidenav,darkMode}=controller;const[onMouseEnter,setOnMouseEnter]=useState(false);const{pathname}=useLocation();// Open sidenav when mouse enter on mini sidenav
const handleOnMouseEnter=()=>{if(miniSidenav&&!onMouseEnter){setMiniSidenav(dispatch,false);setOnMouseEnter(true);}};// Close sidenav when mouse leave mini sidenav
const handleOnMouseLeave=()=>{if(onMouseEnter){setMiniSidenav(dispatch,true);setOnMouseEnter(false);}};// Change the document layout to VR for the VR view
useEffect(()=>{setLayout(dispatch,"vr");setDarkSidenav(dispatch,darkMode);},[pathname]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ArgonBox,{sx:baseLayout,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonBox,{bgColor:darkMode?"transparent":"info",borderRadius:"xl",mt:3,mx:3,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DashboardNavbar,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ArgonBox,{sx:baseLayoutBackground,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonBox,{display:{xs:"block",lg:"none"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidenav,{color:sidenavColor,brand:darkSidenav||darkMode?brand:brandDark,brandName:"Jay Bawa",routes:routes,onMouseEnter:handleOnMouseEnter,onMouseLeave:handleOnMouseLeave})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ArgonBox,{sx:baseLayoutContent,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonBox,{display:{xs:"none",lg:"block"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidenav,{color:sidenavColor,brand:darkSidenav||darkMode?brand:brandDark,brandName:"Argon Dashboard 2 PRO",routes:routes,onMouseEnter:handleOnMouseEnter,onMouseLeave:handleOnMouseLeave})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DashboardLayout,{bgColor:"transparent",children:children})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonBox,{pb:2,pt:0.25,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})})]});}// Typechecking props for the BaseLayout
export default BaseLayout;
